__missingControllerAction ( $  class,
$  method,
array $  params = array() 
) [inherited]

__missingControllerAction Error handler for an unimplemented controller action (on a per controller basis) NOTE: To use, override this method without calling parent::____missingControllerAction() so as to avoid throwing the exception

Parameters:
string$class
string$method
array$params
Exceptions:
ControllerActionNotFoundException
Returns:
void
Author:
